name: Box Clicker (EmiloDev)
description:
How to play:

Press the Box to make Boxes.

use those Boxes to buy stuff to get more Boxes.

you have the option to ascend, this will kill you ,reincarnate you  and convert your previous life Boxes into Cubes.

Cubes can be used on the upgrade tree.

Upgrades are permanent.

Warning: DO NOT TRY TO KILL YOUR SELF I REAL LIFE.

Have nice day.
